name: Drop Zone: Sainte-Mère-Église
description:
Operation OVERLORD was the historic invasion of the European continent and the beginning of the battle to breach the “impenetrable” Atlantic Wall. Drop Zone: Sainte-Mère-Église is the opening act that takes place in and around the sleepy Norman country town of Sainte-Mère-Église located behind Utah Beach, a crucial crossroads for the U.S. Fourth Infantry Division as it fought its way inland. Ten days before D-Day, the plans for dropping the 82nd Airborne Division shifted it from the west side of the Cotentin Peninsula over to the east side, closer to Utah Beach, and responsibility for capturing Sainte-Mère-Église shifted from the 101st Airborne Division to the 82nd, specifically the 505th Parachute Infantry Regiment. Second and Third Battalions, under Lt. Colonels Benjamin Vandervoort and Edward Krause respectively, found themselves tasked with protecting the vital crossroads from German counterattacks aimed at bottling up the Americans on Utah Beach. Facing the paratroopers and the units driving off the beaches were a mixed bag of defenders: Georgians of the coastal defense unit Ost Bataillon 795, Infanterie-Division 709; regular troops from Grenadier-Regiment 1058, Luftlande-Infanterie-Division 91; and the well-equipped Sturm-Bataillon AOK 7—all supported by ad-hoc armor units.

Drop Zone: Sainte-Mère-Église is a Historical Advanced Squad Leader (HASL) module covering the first two days of the battles around the important Norman town of Sainte-Mère-Église. Each side attacks and defends in an effort to do better than their historical counterpart. Can you as the American not only hold the town but also push the German forces off the map as you expand your perimeter? Or can you as the German retake the town from the Americans and delay the invasion?

Drop Zone: Sainte-Mère-Église comes with three historically-accurate maps of the town of Sainte-Mère-Église and its environs jointly crafted by Sharon Boyd, designer Ken Dunn, and artist Charlie Kibler. Additionally, there are 11 individual scenarios each recreating a portion of the battle, as well as three Campaign Games of various sizes depicting either the entire battle or smaller portions of it.

—description from the publisher
categories: Expansion for Base-game, Wargame, World War II
mechanics: Unspecified

name: Shadows of Brimstone: Ghosts of the Damned Game Supplement
description:
Description from the publisher:

Those heroes that brave the mines will tell you—you can feel them watching from the darkness. Ghosts of the fallen, damned to haunt the dusty passages and dimly-lit rooms! This supplement features new Gear, Mine Artifacts, and Mine Encounters, all themed for Ghosts of the Damned. Your heroes can find a 'Holy Charm' or 'Angel's Tears' to help them, or come across characterful artifacts like the 'Cross of Hidalgo' or 'San Pedro's Lantern'! The posse may hear 'Voices from Beyond' or face the horror of 'Bleeding Walls'!

This 15-card Supplement includes 5 Gear, 5 Mine Artifacts, and 5 Mine Encounters themed for the ghosts that haunt the mines of Brimstone.

CONTENTS

Card #164 Holy Charm ×2 (Gear)
Card #165 Mark of the Faithful (Gear)
Card #166 The Grave Digger (Gear)
Card #167 Red Sash (Gear)
Card #168 Angel's Tears ×2 (Mine Artifact)
Card #169 Ring of the Revenant (Mine Artifact)
Card #170 San Pedro's Lantern (Mine Artifact)
Card #171 Cross of Hidalgo (Mine Artifact)

Card #173 The Wretched One (Mine Encounter)
Card #174 Damned if You Do (Mine Encounter)

Card #176 Shades of Terror (Mine Encounter)

name: A Game of Thrones: The Card Game – The Battle of Blackwater Bay
description:
Game description from the publisher:

"A fleet of Stannis Baratheon’s warships sail from Dragonstone and navigate the waters of the Blackwater Bay. Their goal is the city of King’s Landing, their intent is war. But the defenders of the city, with the assistance of Tyrion Lannister, have prepared a little surprise for the invaders, and the promise of unparalleled turmoil is heavy in the air..."

The Battle of Blackwater Bay is the sixth monthly installment of sixty fixed cards for the "King's Landing" expansion to A Game of Thrones: The Card Game, based on George R.R. Martin's best-selling A Song of Ice and Fire saga. It contains three copies each of twenty different never-before-seen cards designed to augment existing decks and add variety to the A Games of Thrones metagame.

"King's Landing" cycle:

- City of Secrets
- A Time of Trials
- The Tower of the Hand
- Tales from the Red Keep
- Secrets and Spies
- The Battle of Blackwater Bay
categories: Card Game, Expansion for Base-game, Fantasy, Fighting, Medieval, Negotiation, Novel-based
mechanics: Hand Management, Open Drafting, Simultaneous Action Selection, Variable Player Powers

name: PRESTAGS Master-Pack
description:
From the back of the box...

Five Complete Simulation Games

At last Simulations Publications has an integrated Pre-Seventeenth Century Tactical Game Systems (PRESTAGS) for simulation of all military systems prior to the predominance of fire weapons.

The game system used in this series is based on the highly-regarded Musket & Pike system (although many modifications and special rules were devised to demonstrate the differences between historical periods). All the games are compatible -- and they can be used to trace the evolution of tactics over the course of history from 3000 B.C. to 1550 A.D. Each game in the series covers a segment of the period, and presents the tactical situations faced by leaders of the great battles of the period.

User Notes:
The five (5) separate games included in the hard to find PRESTAGS Master-Pack are: "CHARIOT: Tactical Warfare in the 'Biblical' Age, 3000-500BC"; "SPARTAN: Tactical Warfare in the Hellenistic Age, 500-100BC"; "LEGION: Tactical Warfare in the Roman Age, 100BC-700AD"; "VIKING: Tactical Warfare in the Dark Ages, 700-1300" and "YEOMAN: Tactical Warfare in the Renaissance Age, 1250-1550". Each game in the pack comes with 400 counters, so the full set contains a whopping 2000 counters. The set is comprised of not one, but two SPI flat packs, along with maps and rules for each game, and with PRESTAGS rules that cover the full series. All the sets are compatible, or as the back of the box states, "Because the strength values of the the units were all derived from the same base, units from one game are entirely compatible with another."
categories: Ancient, Medieval, Wargame
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Hexagon Grid

name: Boss Monster: The Golden Dragon
description:
The Golden Dragon starts the game as a "Thief treasure" Boss, meaning that from the very beginning of the game, you’ll have an edge in luring in Thieves.

All the Boss cards in Boss Monster have a treasure type associated with them. Where The Golden Dragon differs is in his unusually powerful Level Up ability. The first time you build out your dungeon to five cards, The Golden Dragon gains one each of all the other treasure types in the game: the Cleric’s Ankh, The Fighter’s Sword, and the Mage’s Tome. That means that suddenly you’ve got a boss who’s contributing to your dungeon’s attractiveness to each and every Hero type. This is huge, and this edge in bidding for Heroes makes other Boss Monsters green with envy. Just be careful... when the Epic Heroes show up in town, you'd better have a powerful dungeon to defeat all the Heroes you'll be luring!

In game lore, The Golden Dragon's dungeon is the most dangerous in the land of Arcadia, and heroes just can’t resist the fame and glory that could come out of adventuring there. He’s the ultimate Boss Monster.
categories: Card Game, Expansion for Base-game, Fantasy, Video Game Theme
mechanics: Auction/Bidding, Hand Management, Variable Player Powers

name: Winter Offensive Bonus Pack #10: ASL Scenario Bonus Pack for Winter Offensive 2019
description:
ASL Winter Offensive Bonus Pack #10 (2019) features four new scenario designs and two new maps (10a/b & 11a/b).

MMP has an ulterior motive, however, for the manufacture and sale of this particular product. Proceeds from the sales of each WO Bonus Pack #10 are donated to the WWII Foundation. You get two new maps, four more ASL scenarios, and help a great project dedicated to memorializing the efforts of the men who fought in WWII get a very nice donation. This really seems like a win/win in our opinion.

ASL Winter Offensive Bonus Pack #10 (2019) contains:
2 ASL mapboards (10a/b & 11a/b)
4 new ASL scenarios (WO29-WO32)

Scenarios:
WO29 Pynda Avenged - 6 turns, boards 62/73/10b, 19 November 1940, Agios Cosmas, Greece
WO30 As Luck Would Have It - 5-1/2 turns, board 11a, 6 June 1944, Las Bas de Ranville, France
WO31 Ma Deuce Delivers - 5 -1/2 turns, board 11b, 22 August 1944, Fontenay-Saint-Pere, France
WO32 Corps Value - 5-1/2 turns, board 10a, 25 September 1950, Seoul, Korea

The Early Spring Mini Expansion introduces 3 new action cards in each player color. These single-use cards introduce ways to switch cards around in the garden and look at face-down cards. Enjoy the new strategies in your floriferous garden!

—description from the publisher

name: Boss Monster: Epic Multi Heroes
description:
Boss Monster: Epic Multi Heroes is a two card Kickstarter-exclusive expansion for the Boss Monster: The Dungeon Building Card Game game. The following cards are included:


Monster Hunter Epic Multi Hero Card - This Hero is lured to the dungeon with the highest combined Fighter and Cleric treasure. Monster rooms deal -1 damage to this hero.
Trap Master Epic Multi Hero Card - This Hero is lured to the dungeon with the highest combined Magic and Thief treasure. This Hero ignores all Room ability text. When it is in a dungeon, Room activated abilities cannot be used.


Just shuffle these cards into the Hero deck and play!

name: World of Warcraft: The Adventure Game – Wennu Bloodsinger Character Pack
description:
In the World of Warcraft, there are many heroes and many perils. As each foe falls, a new enemy is revealed; as each hero falters a new champion stands forth. Now, new heroes have risen to take their place in the Hall of Legends!

Weenu Bloodsinger, a Troll priest, has devoted herself, body and soul, to the powers of shadow magic. Her unwavering faith in the world of shadow manifests as power words, shadow words, and other terrifying miracles. Using her shadowform, she possesses the eerie, vampire-like ability to drain her opponent of life, leaving nothing behind but a desiccated husk.

Not a complete game. A copy of World of Warcraft: The Adventure Game is required to play.

Game Contents:
28 Challenge Cards
23 Ability Cards
9 Character Tokens
4 Character Cards
1 Character Miniature
4 Quests
4 Discover Tokens

description:
This is a box of goodies that was given to backers of the Kickstarter Campaign.
Extra figures: Elite Gargoh*, sculpted versions of the Avatar of the Abyss* and Ikomoth the Dragon*.
Alternate sculpts: Standard Gargoh, Elite Krohn, Standard Krohn, and Mölen.
Sculpted tokens: First player, morale, food, gold, Divine Grace, Time, Messenger, Alternate Messenger sculpt, protected building, damaged building, destroyed building.
Extra heroes: Thorlak the Barbarian, Astrid the Princess, Donatto the Cook, Dahlia the Peasant, Viggo the Captain, Igor the Quack Doctor, Kirk the Jester, Eivor the Noble, Damiana the Innkeeper, Waldo the Monk*, Kaira the Seer*, Rolf the Executioner*.

These items will be available to non-Kickstarter backers.

name: Heroes of Normandie: Big Red One Edition – Bloody Omaha
description:
June 6, 1944, one word is written in letters of blood and fire in the pages of history books, OMAHA! Thanks to this expansion pack for Heroes of Normandie, you can enjoy a beautiful sunny day at the beach or a quiet and bucolic afternoon at the farm.

In the Heroes of Normandie Bloody Omaha Battlepack, relive the terrible landing of the 1st American Infantry Division (Big Red One). In addition to the forces in the basic package, American forces will have at their disposal combat engineers from the Big Red One, a battalion of Rangers, an infantry regiment from the 29th Division and the 743rd American Tank Battalion. The German forces were not left behind and had at their disposal a battalion of the Festungkompanie, Panzer-Aufklarungs and a Panzergruppe of the 2nd Panzer Division to fiercely defend the beach. Let's not forget the addition of the High Command which will allow you to play the American and German air force, but also to rain artillery on your opponent, will you choose the explosive or smoke shells?

New heroes are available for both sides, and a plethora of equipment and support options. Play through 4 scenarios ranging from Omaha beach to a small farm near the coast with 6 new double-sided terrain boards.

One thing is for sure, you'll understand why this beach was infamously renamed 'Bloody Omaha'.

You must own a copy of Heroes of Normandie, the core box, to play with this Battlepack.

— description from the publisher
categories: Expansion for Base-game, Fighting, Wargame, World War II
mechanics: Dice Rolling, Grid Movement, Variable Player Powers

name: AuZtralia: Promo Packet 1
description:
AuZtralia Promo Pack 1 released for the Kickstarter campaign for the AuZtralia expansions: TaZmania and Revenge of the Old Ones.

Includes new Mythos cards and Helper cards to be used with the base game:

3 new Mythos cards: Cthulhu, Bokrug, Nightgaunt
3 new Solo Mythos cards: Cthulhu, Bokrug, Nightgaunt
10 Helper cards: "Buddy" Budowski, Florence Poison, Elsa Ware, Lord Switchener, Iron Horse Bob, Charles Grey, Captain Rex Porter, Doctor Anton Phibes, Doctor Herbert Combs, and Emily Earhart

The new Mythos cards share the same character names but have slightly different abilities depending on if it's a solo or a regular game:

different points (solo: next to card name, regular: upper left corner),
different backs, and
different rules or text (Nightgaunt is about stealing from another player for 5 turns in the regular game, and in the solo game it's about losing a personality card for 5 turn; and Bokrug and Cthulhu have similar rules between the regular and solo games).
categories: Economic, Expansion for Base-game, Exploration, Fantasy, Horror
mechanics: Action Retrieval, Cooperative Game, Hexagon Grid, Network and Route Building, Solo / Solitaire Game, Turn Order: Time Track
publishers: Ediciones MasQueOca, Giochix.it, Phalanx Games Polska, SchilMil Games, Ltd., Stronghold Games

name: Dust Tactics: Operation "SeeLöwe"
description:
Game description from the publisher:

The Allies are desperate; they face catastrophic losses across the coast of Great Britain. With the situation so dire, they have no choice but to split their focus, sending Her Majesty's fleet to face the Axis Kriegsmarine in the Channel, and leaving the naval base at Scapa Flow defenseless...or so it seems.

Operation "SeeLöwe" (Operation Sea Lion!) offers players eight new exciting scenarios that aren't restricted by a fixed number of army points. New tiles introduce buildings into the game, offering players new tactical decisions in an urban environment. New rules and new super strong and inhuman heroes further immerse you into this stimulating expedition. Also included in Operation "SeeLöwe" is the untold history of the Axis and one of the cornerstones of their forces: the Blutkreuz Korps. Uncover truths known only to a select Axis few.

Introducing a new level of strategy to your Dust Tactics gaming experiences, Operation "SeeLöwe" assures that the battlefield will never be the same.
categories: Expansion for Base-game, Miniatures, Science Fiction, World War II
mechanics: Action Points, Dice Rolling, Modular Board

description:
"A giant city map, and new vehicle counters, for the Car Wars fan who wants a truly big game. This set contains 31 vehicle counters . . . a rule and scenario sheet, and two 31x32 inch map sections. These combine into the 32x42 inch map of East Midville, which in turn connects to the Midville map from Sunday Drivers to form a truly mammoth (42x64 inch) Car Wars map!"

Part of the Car Wars Series.

Expands:

Car Wars

name: Vs. System 2PCG: Legacy
description:
Vs System 2PCG: Legacy is a set of two hundred cards that expands on all of the Marvel Universe teams released to date for the Vs System 2PCG line: The Marvel Battles, The Defenders, and A-Force. Each team gains a new main character and a few supporting characters, including fan favorites such as Captain Britain, Psylocke, Mister Sinister, Taskmaster, Squirrel Girl, and Elektra.

Vs System 2PCG: Legacy also includes replacement main character cards for Thanos as the original cards in The Marvel Battles set were subsequently shown to distort play on the tournament scene.
categories: Card Game, Comic Book / Strip, Expansion for Base-game, Fighting

name: A Game of Thrones: The Card Game – Secrets and Spies
description:
Game description from the publisher:

"In theory, the small council of King's Landing is one of the throne's most potent political assets, a collection of experienced advisors devoted to the good of the realm. In practice, the council is rife with deceit, corruption, treachery, intrigues, and betrayal."

Secrets and Spies is the fifth monthly installment of sixty fixed cards for the "King's Landing" expansion to A Game of Thrones: The Card Game, based on George R.R. Martin's best-selling A Song of Ice and Fire saga. It contains three copies each of twenty different never-before-seen cards designed to augment existing decks and add variety to the A Games of Thrones metagame.

name: Lock ‘n Load: In Defeat, Defiance
description:
An expansion for Heroes of the Blitzkrieg.

In Defeat, Defiance brings the British Expeditionary Force to the battlefield of France 1940. An expansion to the hugely popular Heroes of the Blitzkrieg, In Defeat, Defiance is the biggest British expansion ever. Included are over 170 counters, and fourteen intriguing scenarios.

The 170 counters include Vickers, Cruiser, and Matilda tanks, Bren carriers, 2pdr and 25mm Anti-tank guns, 51mm mortars, Leaders, heroes, snipers, Squads, Bren guns, Boys Anti-tank rifles, and much more. The fourteen scenarios, all designed by Dale Holmstrom (The Swift and the Bold) and Mark Walker, cover everything from British and SS fighting near Arras to Rommel crossing the Brasse Canal."

This game is no longer available and you can find the new, improved and expanded edition in Lock 'n Load Tactical: Heroes in Defiance
categories: Expansion for Base-game, Wargame, World War II
mechanics: Hexagon Grid
